placeholders.description: The installed version of the Parkour plugin.
The number of Courses created.
The number of active Parkour players.

heading: Player Placeholders
description: These are values with context to the provided Player.

placeholders.description: The Player's ParkourLevel.
The Player's ParkourRank.
The Player's number of Parkoins.
The latest Course the Player completed.
The latest Course the Player joined.
The number of Courses the Player has completed.
The number of Courses the Player has yet to be completed.
Completion status for whether the Player completed the specified Course. Output configurable in strings.yml (PlaceholderAPI.CurrentCourseCompleted & PlaceholderAPI.CurrentCourseNotCompleted).
The time delay before the Player can receive the specified Course prize again. Output configurable in strings.yml (Display.X).
The Player's personal best time on the specified Course.
The Player's personal best time, in milliseconds, on the specified Course.
The number of deaths accumulated for the Player's personal best time on the specified Course.

heading: Course Placeholders
description: These are values with context to a provided Course.

placeholders.description: The display name of the Course, falls back to course name if not set.
The global best time on the specified Course.
The global best time, in milliseconds, on the specified Course.
The number of deaths accumulated for the global best time on the specified Course.
The Player's name for the global best time on the specified Course.
The number of times the specified Course has been completed.
The number of times the specified Course has been viewed.
The economic joining fee when joining the Course.
The economic reward for completing the Course.
The number of online Parkour players on the specified Course.
The names of online Parkour players on the specified Course.

heading: Current Course Placeholders
description: These are values with context to the provided Player and their current Course.

placeholders.description: The name of the Course the Player is currently on.
The display name of the Course the Player is currently on, falls back to course name if not set.
The number of deaths accumulated by the Player so far while on the Course.
The time accumulated by the Player so far while on the Course, presented in HH:MM:SS.
The total number of checkpoints on the current Course.
Completion status for whether the Player completed the current Course. Output configurable in strings.yml (PlaceholderAPI.CurrentCourseCompleted & PlaceholderAPI.CurrentCourseNotCompleted).
The global best time on the current Course.
The global best time, in milliseconds, on the current Course.
The number of deaths accumulated for the global best time on the current Course.
The Player's name for the global best time on the current Course.
The Player's best time on the current Course.
The Player's best time, in milliseconds, on the current Course.
The number of deaths accumulated for the Player's best time on the current Course.
The amount of lives remaining on the Course (when a Course has a maximum deaths set).
The number of checkpoints achieved by the Player so far while on the Course.
The time on the specified Course, for the given leaderboard position.
The time, in milliseconds, on the specified Course, for the given leaderboard position.
The number of deaths on the specified Course, given the leaderboard position.
The Player name on the specified Course, given the leaderboard position.

heading: TopTen Placeholders
description: Display a summary of a leaderboard entry. 'TopTen' is a term just to quickly display a summary of the Course's leaderboards, and the position can exceed 10.

placeholders.description: Display a summary of the global leaderboard entry, configurable in the strings.yml to make them themed. (PlaceholderAPI.TopTenResult)
